sentences.sentence: Even so, these are wealthy families who party with the international 1%, and media intrusiveness makes it increasingly difficult to maintain the right image.
sentences.translation: 即便如此，这些都是与国际1%的人一起聚会的富裕家庭，媒体的侵扰使其越来越难以保持正确的形象。

sentences.sentence: American intrusiveness may seem distasteful to Europeans.
sentences.translation: 美国人的多管闲事可能令欧洲人反感。

sentences.sentence: But the system still relies on a high degree of intrusiveness and communal pressure to achieve targets.
sentences.translation: 但政策体系依然依赖于高度的强制力和完成目标的共同压力。
